title: IMirrorComponentFeatureData.ForceUseSeedConfiguration
description: Gets or sets whether to synchronize the configuration of mirror components with the configuration of the mirrored component in this mirror component feature.
returns: True to use the mirrored component configuration for all mirror components, false to not
remarks:
If this property is set to true, the
Referenced configuration
section of the Component Properties dialog is disabled, and you cannot use
IComponent2::ReferencedConfiguration
to change the pattern instance configuration.
